about_the_game:
A soundtrack for horror fans

This downloadable material (DLC) includes the whole original music of the psychological horror title "Stay Still 2." It lasts 20 minutes and features a wide spectrum of ambient instrumental works ranging from soft and lyrical themes to scary and unsettling tones. The soundtrack smoothly weaves together parts of piano, violin, guitar, and electronic drones, creating an immersive auditory experience that pulls the listener into a profoundly sorrowful environment.
